verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: scored] [ARG1: a 41 % approval rating] [ARGM-ADV: compared with a 53 % disapproval rating] , [ARGM-LOC: among all Americans in CNN 's latest poll] .
President Donald Trump scored [ARG1: a 41 % approval rating] [V: compared] [ARG2: with a 53 % disapproval rating] , among all Americans in CNN 's latest poll .
